Introduction

Bona is a South Korean dancer, singer, and actress under Starship Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group WSJN (also known as Cosmic Girls) and its sub-unit WJSN THE BLACK.

She debuted as a part of the group on February 25, 2016, with the release of their first mini-album "Would You Like?", representing the zodiac sign Leo in the group's concept.

On May 12, 2021, she debuted as a member of WJSN's sub-unit, WJSN THE BLACK, with the single album "My Attitude".

Bona debuted as an actress in 2017 with her role in the drama 'The Best Hit'. Since then, she played leading role in dramas such as 'Twenty-Five Twenty-One' in 2022, 'Joseon Attorney: A Morality' in 2023, and 'Pyramid Game' in 2024.
